title: [Project] Real Estate Price Prediction
body:
Price Appraisal is an essential part of the real estate market.
In this project, I used a real estate dataset compiled by others(from Kaggle) to train classification models.
The models can be deployed to predict the sale price of a specific property given various features.
Click on this page for modeling process in Python.

title: [Project] Customer Churn Prediction
body:
Customer Turnover (or Churn) is an popular topic for subscription-based industries (e.g. T-Mobile, Netflix), particularly in telecommunications.
In this project, I used a dataset from a fictional telco company (from Kaggle & IBM) to train classification models.
The models can be deployed to determine whether a customer is likely to churn based on the probability assigned by the model to each customer in the dataset.
Click on this page for the modeling process in Python.

title: About Me

Work/Industry Experience

Throughout my career, I have supported the cause of inventory and manufacturing optimization through the creation of Power BI Dashboards, design and documentation of internal control processes, and hosting of meetings with production planners and managers.
